name: Yandex Tools
description: This plugin generate the meta tag to validate your site with Yandex Webmasters Tools and the JavaScript code to track with Yandex.Metrika.
description_de: This plugin generate the meta tag to validate your site with Yandex Webmasters Tools and the JavaScript code to track with Yandex.Metrika.GERMAN_
description_es: This plugin generate the meta tag to validate your site with Yandex Webmasters Tools and the JavaScript code to track with Yandex.Metrika.SPANISH_
